name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: Classic Italian pasta dish with a rich meat sauce

directions.direction: Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat
Add onions and garlic, cook until soft
Add ground beef and cook until browned
Add tomatoes and simmer for 20 minutes
Cook pasta according to package instructions
Combine pasta and sauce, serve hot
Toast bread slices until golden
Mash avocado and spread on toast
Sprinkle with salt and pepper

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Classic salad with grilled chicken and Caesar dressing

directions.direction: Season chicken breasts and grill until cooked
Wash and chop romaine lettuce
Slice chicken and arrange over lettuce
Add dressing and shaved parmesan

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Classic homemade cookies with chocolate chips

directions.direction: Cream butter and sugars until light and fluffy
Add eggs and vanilla, mix well
Mix in dry ingredients
Fold in chocolate chips
Drop spoonfuls onto baking sheet
Bake at 350Â°F for 10-12 minutes

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: Quick and healthy vegetable stir fry with soy sauce

directions.direction: Heat oil in a wok or large pan
Add vegetables and stir fry for 3-4 minutes
Add soy sauce and other seasonings
Serve hot over rice or noodles
